name: Joffrey Dork, "Joffrey you Bas-turd"
description:
"Joffrey is a great king! And he's totes cool!"
                                    - said no one ever...


This comes with the original design, hand draw and painted in watercolor on the card. These cards are painted fresh "Per Order", so you can order multiple and each one is an original painting signed by the artist, of the same original design. (No robots allowed!)

The Deets 
-Card and Envelope are both Strathmore quality watercolor paper. 
-140 lb. Watercolor Paper 
-Acid Free 
-Size: 5 x 6.875 inches & Envelopes: 5.25 x 7.25 inches 
-80lb. Textured 
.....ewww fancy-

This series is inspired by Awesome Pop Culture and movie characters that have helped shape our childhoods, sense of humor and personalities. From Movies, to Cartoons, TV shows to Cult Classics.

These little dorks can't wait to geek out with you and your friends. They are perfect to send to that special someone to remind them how much you care......Also great for death threats!

The cards come blank on the inside so no need to scribble out Happy Birthdays and bad "get well soon" messages.

Want a larger order? These also come in a set of 4 at a discounted rate. Just select from the drop down menu. :)

Giving as a gift? Just mention it on the notes on your order and I can make sure to wrap them up in some classy butcher paper topped with some sassy twine! For freezies!!

options.name: Joffrey Dork, "Joffrey you Bas-turd", Set of 4

name: Custom Silhouettes
description:
These are custom made digital silhouettes. They can be made in any style, texture, solid colors or patterns. 

To get one made all you do is add this item to your cart and pay for it. After that you need to do 2 more steps. 

1. You have to take 2 pictures of your upper torso completely sideways. Preferably get someone to take it for you. The only requirement is that you try to have a solid color background; a wood door, a towel,curtain etc. The picture quality does not have to be great, you can even use your camera phone, just make sure it is a clear silhouette.( we are limited to the picture you submit so try to get it as clear as possible)

2. You have to email the pictures to info@roosterpop.com with any specifications you want, striped background, crumpled paper texture, flat solid color. Be creative, that's why its custom. Once created you will receive the final draft, if you want any changes in color or texture please feel free to contact back to the same email and adjustments will be made for you.


After that feel free to print it, post it as your profile picture or add them to your wedding invitations. The design is your complete property to produce and reprint as you please.

Uses; wedding invitations, birthday cards, framed in large format, family portraits, etc.

This is a DIGITAL Silhoette, you will receive it in an email so there will be no shipping charge. YAY!

name: A Girl and Her Fish
description:
Print by Josie DeVora.

Sizes available
5"x 7"
8"x 10"
16"x 20"
 Select your from the drop menu down below

This Limited Edition Print is printed on archival paper. It's printed on (5"x 7", 8"x 10", 16"x 20") parchment but the print itself is a bit smaller. This way it can be framed as you see fit. 
(Limited Edition of 50 per size)

Each piece is numbered and signed by the artist (Josie DeVora) and comes with a separate 4" x 6" print the story " A Girl and Her Fish" also signed by the artist.



Her Story
"A Girl and her Fish"

This here is a story of a girl and her fish
Their friendship was started by only a wish
She found herself lonely by her towns river bend
Asking to the night shadows to bring her a friend
As her tears hit the water it started to twirl 
Then she heard a small voice say "don't cry little girl"
From ripples in water it started to form 
A dragon like Koifish was instantly born
It snaked out of the water and started to hover
Asking the poor girl if she cried for a lover
As her mouth was locked speechless and her eyes yet to blink
As her breathing had stopped her heart starting to sink
She new she should fear him and probably freak
But instead she stuttered and started to speak
I cry for the lonely that lives inside of my soul
Even though I'm surrounded I feel so alone
I have mother and father and friends on the side
But when they speak I just choose only to hide
In a place in my head where I'm not weird or fair
Where no one makes fun of my blue colored hair
My teeth have a gap, and my neck is to long
But I can't understand how it's me that is wrong
I was born with these eyes that see a world so unfair
It's not my fault I was born with this odd colored hair
As the fish listened in silence he took it all in
Hearing her heart pouring out from within
They sat for a moment in the still of the night 
As he started to swim now towards her in flight
He wrapped round her shoulders with the gentlest of embrace 
As he slithered his mouth now closer to her face
He got to her ear and quietly whispered
"Your perfect to me" then he nodded and kissed her
It gave her a warmth that filled her inside 
As the feeling of loneliness began to subside
She smiled and he smiled then got up from the floor 
Walked to her house with the black colored door
And there they still live by the cold river bend
Where a girl once asked the night for a friend
The moral is mute to a world that is blind
Less you open the lock to the gates in your mind
Leave feelings of judgement and hatred behind
For sometimes its greater just to be kind
A smile goes a long way and a hugs even better
For a girl can be happy if you only let her

name: "Reeping Siren" Print Josie DeVora painting
description:
Print on archival paper

Drawing you like a moth to a flame, she entices your cattish curiosity. She promises you wonder and answers to all your questions. Her hair flows as if wind and water merged into a vibrant violet ribbon of elegance wrapping around her shapely body like leaves shielding a forbidden fruit. Her eyes are so hypnotizing they distract you from her makeup that clearly states her purpose. She is a Reeping Siren. She is the beginning and the end. The fire that destroyed the forest and the seed that revived it. She only takes the willing and is always willing to take. If ever come the day that you notice her standing in a forest or mysteriously floating in a alley. Stray quickly and look away. Say your goodbyes to whom you must and be ready for when you least expect it you will be caught in her gaze. And like the gaze of any woman with a purpose, she will get her way come YOUR hell or high water.

name: B.D.A.S.L.A. limited Edition Prints
description:
This is a set design/illustrated by RoosterPOP himself. This is part of the BDASLA collection. "Buy Dead Artist to Support a Living Artist". They are stylized versions of the masters of their times. There have been many artist that impact our perception of art today. These are just a few of them, more illistrations will be to come of other amazing artists that have passed.


This is a set of 5 Limited Edition prints on 5"x7" archival watercolor paper.  Or click on the arrow above nd select your size.

Artist in this set:
Frida Kahlo             "Let your hair give you Fridam"
Andy Warhol           "Lunch with Andy"
Salvador Dali          "Slow economic times"
Vincent Van Gogh    "Someone is Gogh-ing to get in trouble"
Pablo Picasso          "Rubix Cubism"

 All proceeds of the sales of the limited edition prints and the originals will go straight to helping art get made. Get your set and help artists keep thinking outside the box! They can only be found on Roosterpop.com, help support! Of Artists, For Artists, By Artists.

name: Falling Alice Pillow
description:
This is a Limited Edition fabric print of an original Josie DeVora watercolor painting. 
Capturing the moment when Alice falls down the rabbit whole. Caught  in a timeless place it seems she is falling forever. Giving her time to take in her surroundings and realizing, she is so lost; she's found. 

Only 40 of these Limited Edition pillows will be hand made and numbered. Designed by artist and hand made by artist.

Printed on 100% Certified organic cotton by Global Organic Textile Standards (GOTS) 

•Machine wash warm or cool using phosphate-free detergent

Available in 
18"x18" 
24"x24"

You get to choose your back side pillow color, Turquoise or Pink pinstriped.

name: Lady Violet Custom Munny Doll by Josie DeVora
description:
This is a Munny doll designed and painted by one of our best artist Josie DeVora. It is hand painted and clear coated for her protection.
She is about 4" tall. As always this is a one of a kind and will not be reproduced. She is the perfect shade of purple to add to your collection.

name: Cloud Maker
description:
The creater of the clouds and the voice of the wind. She stands watch over mankind unable to interfere. She watches as trees rise and fall to mans ego. 

Print by Josie DeVora.

Sizes available
8"x 8"
16"x 16"
 Select your from the drop menu down below

This Limited Edition Print is printed on archival paper.
 It's printed on ( 8"x 8", 16"x 16") parchment but the print itself isa bit smaller. This way it can be framed as you see fit. 
(Limited Edition of 50 per size)

name: There is Color Even in the Darkest of Places, hard cover book
description:
This is a Limited edition hard cover book with over 40 of Josie DeVora's recent art works. This edition is limited to 30, so get it while they are still available.

Each one of these books is a 8"x8" and signed and numbered for authenticity. 


As always proceeds for this purchase go directly back twards helping artist make more art!

name: Robama Print
description:
"Who better to lead us to the future then someone from the future" 

Our star ship commander and chief Robama. Inspired by forward thinking and ideals that will lead us through to tomorrow. 

Show your support of forward thinking and get your limited edition print today.

name: Modern and Classical Portraits
description:
No Robots here.
 
Not your modern day machine artwork. Every piece is hand designed, sketched and painted by an actual modern day artist. With Styles ranging from comic book, abstract, photo realistic, surrealist, low-brow and everything in between.

Mediums also range from Watercolor,Acrylic, Oil, Digital hand tablet painted, Pen and Charcoal pencil.

Artist:
Josie DeVora
August Adams
RoosterPOP
LoLo

Any Questions you have about the process can be directed to info@roosterpop.com

Once purchased you will receive an email explaining what is needed.
Average turn around time is about 2 weeks.

name: "Sacrifice"  Original piece by Josie DeVora
description:
Original Watercolor/Acrylic on wood by artist Josie DeVora.

 "I believe that in our heads we are all kings and queens. Whether we are right or wrong, in our heads we are law. So I made the paper boats as a representation of our personal self made crowns. Any person can afford a piece of paper; whether it's bought, borrowed or stolen. We fold and overlap the paper where we decide. The bigger the crown the more the self confidence. The smaller or darker crowns reflect someone not so in control or maybe even self destructive in some cases. I think symbolism is amazing in how it works. For me it's literally a painted picture of how you feel, whether you want the world to know or not. Another metaphor you will see a lot in my art is the Band-Aid. If it's on the heart it represents a survivor of the war of love, someone who has been hurt before. In other cases I put the Band-Aid on the ribs, to signify sacrifice. Like Adam, sometimes we have to give something painful up for something greater."
         -Josie DeVora

name: "Elanore Everyoung" Print by Josie DeVora
description:
Print on high quality archival paper.

Sizes available
5"x 7"
8"x 10"
16"x 20"
 Select your from the drop menu down below

"Betrayed by her own flesh, she finds herself draining the life from all around. Entrapped in the vanity of the mirror walls she built for herself. Her sole purpose is to maintain the face that once attracted the boys of the town. So consumed in her selfish quest that she overlooks the facts. There is no more town, no more boys and no more life.....just her, her mirrors and her perfect face, that no one will ever have the chance to gaze upon. The lonely Elanore Everyoung is she."

name: "Hard Headed" Original painting by Josie DeVora
description:
Original painting by Josie DeVora (2"x4")

The Manimals collection This collection was inspired by how easily comparable man is to animal when it comes to mental self defense against the world. Whether it's through brute sarcasm. Blending in with your surroundings as to never get noticed. Or learning how to slow down your mind to enjoy the worlds subtleties and blocking out all the ignorance. I have always been fascinated by human interaction and how we all adapt differently to our surroundings. The way we must evolve to how the world treats us. "Too many tigers on the ground, learn to be a bird and soar above them".

name: Dark Shadows Barnabas Collins (ORIGINAL)
description:
This is a portrait of Barnabas Collins the main character of the Movie Dark Shadows. 

This is acrylic and watercolor on birchwood. Original painting by Josie DeVora.

This is the first in a collection of hollywood vampires.

name: Paper Crown 4 (ORIGINAL)
description:
Original Josie DeVora Acrylic on wood painting.


The vision I had for these crowns was to serve as reminders. It is human nature to hold a grudge or forget something. We tend to be so distracted by life we overlook, at times, our flaws. Sometimes we have to remember to let go of someone who has left our lives. Or in some cases we have to remind ourselves to be strong enough to deal with the life we have chosen. I want people to get the crown they most relate to. Whether it's an incredibly intricate one, a small one or a dark one. The one that really reflects your true vulnerability. The one that you will look at every day as you wake or as you leave your home. Reminding you that you are the ruler of your life, you set the rules and boundaries. But always remembering that your rain is to improve your world, not worsen. I want you to wright on the crowns lines the thing you have to remind yourself everyday. To "Forgive" a lover, "Forget" a loved one who's passed or to "Be Strong" for your family.  Reality is we are all strong yet weak, imprisoned yet free, giving but selfish. Don't hate being flawed, own it and sail away.

Wood panel is 3"x3"
